questions.question: When a system is subjected to forced vibrations then under steady state conditions

answers.a: It vibrates at its natural frequency
answers.b: It vibrates at its imposed frequency
answers.c: It vibrates at the mean of natural frequency and imposed frequency

questions.question: What is the effect of damping on phase angle at resonance frequency?

answers.a: Phase angle increases as damping increases
answers.b: Damping has no effect on phase angle
answers.c: Phase angle increases as damping decreases

questions.question: When frequency ratio (ω/ωn) is greater than 1, the phase angle decreases as?
The phase difference or phase angle in forced vibrations is

answers.a: Difference between displacement vector (xp) and velocity vector Vp
answers.b: Angle in which displacement vector leads force vector by (F0 sinωt)
answers.c: Angle in which displacement vector (xp) lags force vector (F0 sinωt)
